sentences.sContent: I saw Peter as I was getting off the bus.
sentences.sCn: 我下公共汽车的时候看见了彼得。

sentences.sContent: As time passed, things seemed to get worse.
sentences.sCn: 随着时间的推移，情况似乎变得更加糟糕了。

sentences.sContent: Just as the two men were leaving, a message arrived.
sentences.sCn: 那两个男子刚要离开，消息就传来了。

sentences.sContent: ...such as a worried man alone in a tiny rowboat...

...organisations increasingly use “team” as a verb rather than a noun: they form teams for specific purposes and then quickly disband them...

...You feel the same emotions—it is just as raw...
...There’s an ancient legend that as long as these eggs are made...

synos.tran: 因为；随着；虽然；依照；当…时
